event.title: Thursday as Los Angeles election officials finished

data.event: The solar energy ballot measure known as Measure B went down to defeat Thursday as Los Angeles election officials finished their count of the remaining 49,000 mail-in, provisional and damaged ballots.

event.title: Sixteen days after the election, city officials announced

data.event: Sixteen days after the election, city officials announced that Measure B had fallen short of a majority -- with 50.5% of voters opposing the plan and 49.5% in favor of it.
